channel.title: Make Yell Colorful Please Help
channel.description:
ok guys i was wondering how i can make my Yells colored for example Admins Gold and Mods Silver etc..... here is one of the codes [code] } else if (playerRights == 2) { yell("[Admin]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5));[/code]
so how would i make that to be Gold Text if not the text atleast the Name

item.title: Make Yell Colorful Please Help
item.dc:creator: @edge1 edge®
item.description:
@edge1 wrote:

Jelenim:

The above wouldn’t work for more than 95% of the clients.

if it does work i just helped him on an easy way, and like i said, if it doesn’t work follow a tutorial in the tut section.

Read full topic

item.title: Make Yell Colorful Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Jelenim Jelenim
item.description:

item.title: Make Yell Colorful Please Help
item.dc:creator: @edge1 edge®
item.description:
@edge1 wrote:

Try this please:

} else if (playerRights == 2) { yell("[Admin]-@gre@["+playerName+"]:@red@ " +command.substring(5));

would appear as:

[Admin]-Playername:Your message

enjoy.

note: if you donot have a bluurs client i would like to say add colors client sided, there are tutorials on this forum so.

Read full topic
